How can I use Verus to integrate my currency or token with the Ethereum ecosystem?

Any currency or token on Verus or any other PBaaS-blockchain can be exported to Ethereum as an ERC-20 token. This allows them to be used within the Ethereum ecosystem. Additionally, any existing ERC-20 token can be mapped one-to-one as a Verus currency, allowing it to take advantage of all the Layer 1 features on the Verus blockchain.
